com.bragi.sonify.composer.riffology

Class MidiAppender

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bragi.sonify.composer.riffology.MidiAppender

  • public class MidiAppender
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates a MIDI sequence by appending MIDI files.
    Author:
    Sebastian Muszytowski , Jan-Christoph Klie

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MidiAppender(int ppq)
      Creates a new MidiAppender istance while specifying the resolution of the MIDI sequence to generate.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFile(java.io.File f)
      Appends the MIDI file given to the MIDI sequence of this MidiAppender instance
      javax.sound.midi.Sequence getSequence()
      Returns the sequence generated by appending other MIDI files

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • MidiAppender

        public MidiAppender(int ppq)
             throws javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException
        Creates a new MidiAppender istance while specifying the resolution of the MIDI sequence to generate. THIS HAS TO BE THE SAME RESOLUTION AS THE ONE OF ALL FOLLOWING FILES WHICH WILL BE APPENDED OR THE TIMING OF THE GENERATED SEQUENCE WILL BE SCREWED UP!
        Parameters:
        ppq - The resolution of the MIDI sequence to generate in pulses per quarter (PPQ)
        Throws:
        javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException

    • Method Detail

      • addFile

        public void addFile(java.io.File f)
             throws javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException,
                    java.io.IOException
        Appends the MIDI file given to the MIDI sequence of this MidiAppender instance
        Parameters:
        f - The MIDI file to append
        Throws:
        javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException
        java.io.IOException

      • getSequence

        public javax.sound.midi.Sequence getSequence()
        Returns the sequence generated by appending other MIDI files
        Returns:
        The sequence generated
